title: Curriculum Vitae
subtitle: Senior Android Developer & Sub-Leader, Mobile Department

personal.name: Math Rorpheeyah
personal.title: Senior Android Developer & Sub-Leader, Mobile Department

summary: Senior Android Developer with over 5 years of experience developing enterprise-grade mobile applications with comprehensive security implementations. Currently serving as Sub-Leader of the Mobile Department at KOSIGN, where I lead development initiatives, mentor junior engineers, and establish technical standards. My research interests include mobile application security, modern Android architecture patterns, and developer education through structured mentorship programs. Expert in Google Play Console management, secure coding practices, and third-party security library integration for high-profile enterprise clients.

mentorship.title: Teaching & Mentorship
mentorship.description: Dedicated to developing the next generation of mobile engineers through structured mentorship and knowledge sharing

achievements.title: Junior Developer Mentorship Program
achievements.description: Mentored 12+ junior Android developers through structured guidance, code reviews, and hands-on project collaboration. Two mentees successfully advanced to senior-level positions.

achievements.title: Technical Training & Workshops
achievements.description: Led internal training sessions on Android architecture patterns, security best practices, and modern development workflows

achievements.title: Code Review & Quality Assurance
achievements.description: Established code review standards and conducted daily reviews to ensure code quality, knowledge transfer, and team skill development

professionalOverview.title: Technical Leadership & Team Development
professionalOverview.description: Leading the Mobile Department as Sub-Leader, developing junior engineers through structured mentorship, and driving technical excellence across enterprise projects.

professionalOverview.title: Core Research Areas
professionalOverview.description: Specialized in Android development with deep expertise in Kotlin, Java, modern architecture patterns (MVVM, Clean Architecture), and comprehensive mobile security implementations using industry-standard enterprise solutions.

professionalOverview.title: International Collaboration
professionalOverview.description: Strategic international assignment in South Korea, facilitating cross-cultural collaboration and advancing global development practices through knowledge exchange.

experiences.title: Senior Android Developer & Sub-Leader, Mobile Department
achievements: Lead Android development using Kotlin and Java for enterprise applications
Manage mobile team operations as Sub-Leader
Build apps using MVVM and Clean Architecture patterns
Introduced Jetpack Compose to the team for modern UI development
Implement mobile security features including data encryption and secure authentication
Handle all Google Play Console tasks: app releases, testing, compliance, and policy issues
Integrate third-party security libraries using custom AAR files and local Maven
Test app security by running malware detection validation
Keep apps updated with latest API requirements, Firebase, and Crashlytics
Test push notifications and work with vendors on library updates
Mentor junior developers and delegate project tasks
Received "Best Rookie" award in November 2020

experiences.title: International Assignment – Business Trip
achievements: Spent one year in South Korea working with both Cambodian and Korean development teams
Reviewed technical docs from Korean teams and broke down tasks for the Cambodia team
Worked with security documentation and helped implement security features in our apps
Set up and tested security SDKs using proper integration methods
Checked features across Android apps to make sure everything worked as expected
Worked directly with Korean developers and managers on app features and QA
Helped with security testing procedures
Bridged communication between teams and helped solve technical issues
Joined cross-team meetings and helped strengthen partnerships

experiences.title: Web Developer
achievements: Developed responsive web applications without third-party frameworks (custom CSS)
Built backend functionality and logic using PHP
